casebody.data:
WINDHAM
v.
BRITTHAVEN. No. 641P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 21, 2005. Erin D. McNeill, T. Carlton Younger, III, for Britthaven, Inc. et al. Thomas W. Henson, Jr., Rocky Mount, Adam Stein, Chapel Hill, for Deborah Windham.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th day of November 2005 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference this the 21st day of November 2005."
